tool.name: Virtual DNA Digest
tool.description: with a large selection of enzymes

tool.help:
**What it does**
Digest a DNA string with selected enzymes.
For an input fasta file:
::
>test QQQQQQQQQAGGCCTAAAAAAAAAAAAGCCGCCCCCCCCCCCCGACNNNNNNGTCRRRRRRRRRR >test2 QQQQQQQQQGAAAAAAAAAAAAACGCCCCCCCCCCCC
This will be digested into appropriate fragments when cut with Bsp13I, Bsp6I, and DseDI
::
>test_0 [orig=test;status=linear;cut_with=Bsp13I,Bsp6I,DrdI] TAAAAAAAAAAAAGC
>test_1 [orig=test;status=linear;cut_with=Bsp13I,Bsp6I,DrdI] CGCCCCCCCCCCCCGACNNNN
>test_2 [orig=test;status=linear;cut_with=Bsp13I,Bsp6I,DrdI] NNGTCRRRRRRRRRRQQQQQQQQQAGGCC
>test2_0 [orig=test2;status=circular;cut_with=] QQQQQQQQQGAAAAAAAAAAAAACGCCCCCCCCCCCC
Undigested fragments will retain their "circular" label and indicate that they haven't been cut by any enzymes.
